titleStmt.title: J. M. Sandifer et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG7474

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Somerset Ky December 4th 1865
To his Excellency
Thos E Bramlette
Gov of Kentucky
Sir

Your Undersigned Petitioners State that at the late Term of the Pulaski Circuit Court (September) there was judgement rendered against M E Ingram C A Zachary and Henry Artman of Somerset Ky Upon an Indictment for selling whiskey to John Dutton a Minor, Judgement was rendered upon the confession of the aforesaid parties; and the fine against them amounting to ($50) fifty dollars We therefore Respectfully ask that the Sd ^fine^ be Remitted ^Except^ the Atty fee

J M Sandifer
E D Pirch
J. E. Cosson
W McKee Fox
W B Moore
W D Carpenter
S M Hays
J M Gossett
S. F. Tomlinson
T Q Eastham
Saml. T. Wolsey
O M
C W Richardson
Milford Elliot
W M Fox
J J Chesney
C R Bachellor Co atty P C
R Willson
H. H. Gregg
I have permitted my Son John Dutton to Trade for himself Keep Bar Room and have taken a drink with him at Artman Ingram & zacharys Bar therefore ask that Said fine be Remitted,

Daniel Dutton states that he is the Father of John Dutton, the minor to whom it is charged that Artman Ingram & Zachary sold the liquor. I have been in the habit of drinking with son in all the groceries in Somerset -- I permitted him to trade and do business himself, and that permission was generally ^Known^ and acted in this County -- He has treated me & I him often --

Pulaski Cir Ct
vs
M. E Ingram C. A Zachary & Henry Artman
$50,
Tipling
Remitted 16th Dec/65
